file.name: .checkstyle
file.content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <fileset-config file-format-version="1.2.0" simple-config="true"> <local-check-config name="CADERO" location="/etc/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml" type="project" description=""> <property name="checkstyle.suppressions.file" value="/home/t5h0qo/code/xdebt/tmp/ptep/cadero/../etc/checkstyle/checkstyle-suppressions.xml"/> <additional-data name="protect-config-file" value="true"/> </local-check-config> <fileset name="all" enabled="true" check-config-name="CADERO" local="true"> <file-match-pattern match-pattern="." include-pattern="true"/> </fileset> --> <filter name="FileTypesFilter" enabled="true"> <filter-data value="java"/> </filter> <filter name="NonSrcDirs" enabled="true"/> </fileset-config>

properties.maven.cadero.web.firstFilter: --> <context-param> <param-name>javamelody.datasources</param-name> <!-- note: should be "java:comp/env/jdbc/cadero", but this was to late to change --> <param-value>java:comp/env/jdbc.cadero</param-value> </context-param> <filter> <filter-name>monitoring</filter-name> <filter-class>net.bull.javamelody.MonitoringFilter</filter-class> <async-supported>true</async-supported> </filter> <filter-mapping> <filter-name>monitoring</filter-name> <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern> </filter-mapping> <listener> <listener-class>net.bull.javamelody.SessionListener</listener-class> </listener> <!--
